SEARCH
Package client

Class ServerConnector

java.lang.Object
client.ServerConnector
public class ServerConnector extends Object
Handles the logic for connecting the client to the game server.

This class is responsible for establishing the initial socket connection, performing the handshake/negotiation protocol (selecting game mode, hosting/joining lobbies), and transitioning the UI state based on the connection result.

  • Method Details

    • setServerPort

    • connect

      public void connect(GameMode gameMode)
      Initiates a connection to the server in a separate thread.

      This method starts the handshake process based on the selected GameMode. It updates the UI with progress messages ("Connecting...", "Waiting for opponent...") and handles any connection errors.

      Parameters:
      gameMode - The game mode to initiate (Quick Play, Host, or Join).
